steps.details: Secure affected track section and run diagnostic tests to locate and repair the circuit fault.
Provide updates on platform displays and announcements about delays and alternate options.
Implement manual control protocols for limited service while repairs proceed.
Send track and signalling engineers with replacement modules and test kits.
Arrange BMTC supplemental services for affected commutes.
Inform passengers of temporary skip-stop pattern and provide signage for alternate boarding.
Place staff at Majestic and Chickpete to manage increased boarding demand.
Continuously monitor crowding and open additional entry points as needed.
Adjust surface transport to help move passengers away from congested metro nodes.
Operations to re-evaluate headways and consider restoring normal stops when safe.
Introduce additional buses and temporary shuttle routes to handle overflow passengers.
Clear bus lanes from auto/taxi queuing to maintain scheduled movements.
Organize staged pick-up points to prevent lane blocking and improve throughput.
Push coordinated updates across metro, bus and ride-hailing apps to distribute passenger loads.
Collect data on mode-shifts to improve future contingency planning.
